pageContext.geocode_address: 3369 Union Avenue, San Jose, CA 95124, USA
pageContext.public_note: Summer registration opens Saturday, February 23rd at 10:00am!
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Learn how to bring your LEGO速 creations to life!  Create skits and plots, learn how to make storyboards for planning scenes,  build intricate LEGO速 sets and characters from tens of thousands of LEGO速 pieces,  and learn how to animate and edit footage on computers (also adding voices and sound effects)! At the end of class, students receive animations through internet sharing!
